message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and productivity. Given its value to you, I understand it might be worth $8,000 to you. However, considering the exceptional quality and unique features of this product, I am offering it to you for a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents an excellent opportunity for you to maximize your investment while securing a valuable asset at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
